transparencyUpdates.title: Validation review update
transparencyUpdates.summary: Validation work continues with disciplined monitoring and public-safe progress reporting.
bullets: Validation work continues with public-facing documentation and monitoring improvements while private methods remain non-public.
Current validation gate status remains within the expected operating envelope.
Public summaries continue to describe maturity, process changes, and disclosure boundaries without exposing private internals.
nextSteps: Continue evidence collection before expanding operational scope.
Review internal monitoring outputs on a regular cadence.
Publish curated progress summaries through public status and transparency pages.
